name: Dimension Drifter
description: You are one of the most dangerous people in the world. Our timeline has collapsed hundreds of years ago. Since then, Ancient Gods have emerged through the cracks of reality, shaping it into a twisted realm of chaos. You are the only one who can stop them. Get ready.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX / AMD Radeon 6870 HD or higher DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Windows compatible
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 3 GHz or faster Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 660 / AMD Radeon HD 7870 or higher DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Windows compatible
